content:
WcfCommunicationListener<TServiceContract>.ServiceHost Property

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Wcf.Runtime
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Wcf.dll

In this Article

Gets the ServiceHost used by this listener to host the WCF service implementation.

public System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost ServiceHost { get; }
Returns
ServiceHost

A ServiceHost used by this listener to host the WCF service implementation.

Remarks

The service host is created by the listener in it's constructor. Before this communication listener is opened by the runtime via method, the service host can be customized by accessing it via this property.
